episodes.title: Adi Da and His Voracious Abusive Personality Cult Podcast Chapter 2
episodes.description: In this episode, we explore the life and controversial teachings of Franklin Jones, later known as Adi Da Samraj. Born in 1939, Adi Da studied philosophy and literature before embarking on a spiritual path that led him to found his own religious movement, Adidam. Proclaiming himself a divine avatar, Adi Da built a community centered on total devotion to him. However, as described by religious scholar Scott Lowe, the group became known for its authoritarian structure, manipulation, and reports of abuse. Join us as we dive into the complex and troubling legacy of Adi Da, his teachings, and the impact on his followers.
